configuration_schema.description: Configuration of inband OAM model Info.

inband-oam.description: Inband OAM flow alternate marking configuration.

label.description: The label ranges from 4 to 6 and 8 to 12(default:12).

flow-id.description: The flow id to identify a specific flow,ranges from 1 to 1048575.

alternate-status.description: The status of flow alternate marking,including enable and disable(default:enable).

period.description: The period of flow coloring,including 1s,5s,10s,30s,60s,5min and 15min(default:30s).

dm-dscp.description: The DSCP value in delay measurement of IP flow,ranges from 0 to 63.

dm-exp.description: The EXP value in delay measurement of TE tunnel,ranges from 0 to 7.

hop-by-hop-status.description: The status of hop-by-hop coloring,including enable and disable(default:enable).

per-packet-dm-status.description: The status of per-packet delay measurement,including enable and disable(default:enable).

flow-type.description: Choose one flow type from ip and TE tunnel.
Choose one flow type from ip and TE tunnel.

ip.description: The coloring flow type is ip.
The coloring flow type is ip.

ifname.description: The UNI interface name of ip flow.

member-port.description: The member port of the UNI interface.

ipv4-or-ipv6.description: Choose one from ipv4 and ipv6.
Choose one from ipv4 and ipv6.

dscp.description: The value of DSCP,ranges from 0 to 63.

eth.description: The coloring flow type is eth.

vlan-id.description: The value of vlan ID,ranges from 1 to 4094.

internal-vlan-id.description: The value of internal vlan ID,ranges from 1 to 4094.

priority-8021p.description: The value of priority-8021p,ranges from 0 to 7.

tunnel.description: The coloring flow type is TE tunnel.
The coloring flow type is TE tunnel.

tunnel-id.description: Tunnel ID,the upper limit of this parameter depend on the device.

flow-id.description: The flow id to identify a specific flow,ranges from 1 to 1048575.
The flow id to identify a specific flow,ranges from 1 to 1048575.

ifname.description: The physical interface name passed through by the flow.

relations.description: Configure the relation between Flowid and VRF.

relation.description: Configure the relation between Flowid and VRF.

flow-id.description: The flow id to identify a specific flow,ranges from 1 to 1048575.

vpn-type.description: Choose one from vrf and vpws.

vrf-name.description: The name of VRF,this string length ranges from 1 to 32.

vpws-name.description: The name of VPWS,this string length ranges from 1 to 32.

evpn-vpws-name.description: EVPN VPWS name,this string length ranges from 1 to 32.

ifname.description: Access point bound to the EVPN.

vpls-name.description: The name of VPLS,this string length ranges from 1 to 32.

period.description: The flip period of relation,range form 1000 to 900000(default 30000).

per-packet-dm-status.description: The status of per-packet delay measurement,including enable and disable(default:enable).

ifname.description: The UNI interface name of relation.
